title: 菊花賞の後に・敗北を越え、次の憧れへ

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower in first...!
I can't believe she actually won...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, haa, haa...!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Rice did it, I did it...
I did it...! I caught up!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Rice-san.
That was a good run.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You know, it's all thanks to you, Bourbon-san...!
Rice was chasing after you!
So—

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I feel the same way.
...Let's do our best in the senior division too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hooaaah~~.
I couldn't reach it~...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Next time, maybe.
Yeah, next time for sure, I'll win next time!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, I thought I could do it today, you know.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes. But I saw some issues again, and I found out I can compete pretty well in long-distance big races too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So, with that...
I have a little proposal—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: After the Classic Triple Crown, I've been thinking about what I want to challenge next.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Do you remember what the chairman said during the summer training camp?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Things like 'I'm not drawn to your record' or 'It's precisely because you're ordinary that you're appealing'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It makes me really happy, but honestly, there's a part of me that isn't fully convinced?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because, usually, someone who can inspire others is strong, cool, and sparkling, right?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Right?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm happy about the expectations and want to meet them, but the more I think about it, the less I know how to respond~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, for now, I think I'll just go in the direction my heart desires!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So, the one that really got me fired up was...
The 'Tenno Sho (Spring)', to be precise...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I know, it won't be easy!
It's a 3200m G1 long-distance race,
the one that decides the strongest stayer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The tactics are sure to be way more difficult,
and my stamina probably still isn't enough yet.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But still, winning on that big stage in spring...
It's something to aspire to, isn't it...!

As usual, she's probably unaware of it herself,
but it's a very positive opinion.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So, not exactly as a prep race for that,
but I want to fit in a long-distance race before spring.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: For example, the 'Diamond Stakes' at 3400m or something!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...What do you think?

There's no particular reason to refuse. In fact, if it's her wish,
I want to grant it as much as possible. So—
choice_data_list: Got it, let's aim for the 'Diamond S' next

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Alright, this time for sure.
I'll do my best... I'll do my best!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Wow, that was a great race.
Bourbon and the others, of course...
And Matikanetannhauser too!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser, you mean that girl?

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. She got a bit of attention after the 'Japanese Derby'!
She's positive and has a friendly personality.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
She doesn't have overwhelming talent or anything,
but she's a strong girl who never gives up and keeps trying.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Never gives up and keeps trying... I see.

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text:
Ah, excuse me!
Could I interview you a bit about those feelings?

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text:
Especially regarding
Matikanetannhauser-san!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, nice, nice.
Spread the word about Tannhauser's good points~.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
People are watching, after all.
...Just saying.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Alright, let's hurry back and run!
I'm gonna do my best too!
Even if I didn't win, I quietly showed my true strength in the 'Kikuka Sho'.
Next up is the 'Diamond Stakes', with an even longer distance!
